All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractScreen
    Generic implementation of GuiView interface.
    AlphaVantageData
    Implements StockDataUtil interface.
    BuyBySip<T>
    Implements the PortfolioOperation interface and allows to create a portfolio with a basket of stocks and periodically invest in the basket of stocks.
    BuyBySipTest
    A JUnit Test class for BuyBySip class.
    BuyByWeights<T>
    Implements the PortfolioOperation interface and allows the user to bulk purchase multiple stocks in a single transaction on a specific date.
    BuyByWeightsScreen
    Displays a GUI screen that allows user to buy multiple stocks in a single transaction based on weights.
    BuyByWeightsTest
    A JUnit Test class for BuyByWeights class.
    BuySellStocksPage
    Displays a GUI screen that allows user to buy/sell stocks in the chosen portfolio, on a particular date.
    Constants
    Class to maintain constants used in various classes.
    Constants.TransactionType
    An enum which describes the valid transaction types allowed in the portfolio.
    Controller
    Creates a Controller interface for the Program execution.
    ControllerImpl
    Implements the Controller interface.
    ControllerImplTest
    A JUnit Test class for Controller class.
    CreatePortfolioScreen
    Displays a GUI screen that allows user to create a portfolio.
    CreatePortfolioWithSipScreen
    Displays a GUI screen that allows user to create a portfolio with a basket of stocks and periodically invest in the basket of stocks.
    DrawGraph
    Creates a Line Graph using Graphics2D for a given set of data points.
    EditPortfolioPage
    Displays a GUI screen that allows user to edit a portfolio and buy/sells stocks in the chosen portfolio.
    ErrorScreen
    Displays a GUI Error screen with a message to the user.
    Features
    Interface for all the features that the controller can perform on the model.
    FlexiblePortfolioImpl
    It is an implementation of the Portfolio interface.
    FlexiblePortfolioImplTest
    A JUnit Test class for FlexiblePortfolio class.
    GraphScreen
    Displays the performance of a portfolio as a line chart.
    GuiController
    Implements the Features interface.
    GuiControllerTest  
    GuiView
    Interface of the Graphical User Interface for the Portfolio Management View.
    HomeScreen
    Displays a GUI screen that allows user choose and interact with different features offered in the program.
    InflexiblePortfolioImpl
    Implements the Portfolio interface.
    InflexiblePortfolioImplTest
    A JUnit Test class for InflexiblePortfolio class.
    InfoScreen
    Displays a GUI Info screen with a message to the user.
    LocalStockData
    Implements StockDataUtil interface.
    LoginScreen
    Displays a GUI screen that allows user to either login or create an account in the program.
    Portfolio
    Represents a User's Portfolio with a portfolio name, creation date and user's stocks within the portfolio.
    PortfolioManagementModel
    Represents a Portfolio Manager for a user.
    PortfolioManagementModelImpl
    An implementation of the PortfolioManagementModel.
    PortfolioManagementModelImplTest
    A JUnit Test class for PortfolioManagementModel class.
    PortfolioManagementView
    An interface to depict the different views that can be created.
    PortfolioManagementViewImpl
    An implementation of the PortfolioManagementView class that provides a text based view for all it's interface methods.
    PortfolioManagementViewImplTest
    A JUnit Test class for PortfolioManagementView class.
    PortfolioOperation<T>
    Interface to extend the operations that the Portfolio Management model can perform the Portfolio objects.
    ProgramRunner
    Main class that executes the Portfolio Management program.
    ShowTableScreen
    Display a JTable as a popup screen with the provided table headers and data.
    StockDataUtil
    Utility library to retrieve and manipulate stock data.
    StockImplTest
    A JUnit Test class for Stock class.
    Tickers
    Utility class to update stock ticker list and check if stock ticker is present in the database.
    TransactionItem
    Represents a single line of the transaction file associated with a portfolio.
    TransactionItemTest
    A JUnit Test class for TransactionItem class.
    Util
    Utility library with helper methods to process user inputs.
    ViewCompositionPage
    Displays a GUI screen that allows user to choose a portfolio and provide a date to view the composition of the portfolio on that specified date.
    ViewCostBasisPage
    Displays a GUI screen that allows user to choose a portfolio and provide a date to view the cost-basis of the portfolio upto that specified date.
    ViewPerformancePage
    Displays a GUI screen that allows user to choose a portfolio and provide a date range to view the performance of the portfolio for that specified date range.
    ViewValuationPage
    Displays a GUI screen that allows user to choose a portfolio and provide a date to view the valuation of the portfolio on that specified date.
